summary: This is an electronic court notice from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals regarding the case United States v. Maxwell. It acknowledges the filing of an 'Acknowledgment and Notice of Appearance' on behalf of appellant Ghislaine Maxwell, and provides service details and recipient information for the notice.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the appellant in the case United States of America v. Maxwell, for whom a notice of appearance was filed.

persons.name: David Oscar Markus
persons.context: Listed as a recipient (via electronic mail) of the court notice regarding the filing in Ghislaine Maxwell's appeal.

persons.name: Tammy Tones
persons.context: Listed as a recipient (via electronic mail) of the court notice; appears twice in the recipient list, once with the title 'Deputy er' (likely a typo for 'Deputy Clerk') and once as 'Deputy Clerk Quality Control 1'.

connections.description: Markus is listed as receiving notice of a court filing on behalf of appellant Ghislaine Maxwell, indicating he is likely part of her legal defense team.

events.title: Notice of Appearance Filed for Maxwell Appeal
events.description: An 'Acknowledgment and Notice of Appearance' was filed electronically with the Second Circuit Court of Appeals on behalf of appellant Ghislaine Maxwell in case 21-770.

keyFacts: The document is a court notice regarding the ongoing appellate case United States of America v. Maxwell (21-770) in the Second Circuit.
An 'Acknowledgment and Notice of Appearance' was filed on April 5, 2021, formally indicating legal representation for appellant Ghislaine Maxwell.
Attorney David Oscar Markus and Deputy Clerk Tammy Tones were among the recipients notified of this filing.
